value.title: How to Focus on the "One Thing" and Rise Faster in Your Career? üî¥ Talk Power BI LIVE
value.excerpt: We often confuse movement with progress. We work...and we work hard. We have a long, never-ending and ever-expanding To-Do list. But is that the shortest path to success? value.title: How to Manage a Global Supply Chain with Power BI üî¥Talk Power BI LIVE (Subscribe & Join)

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Stacked Bar Chart with Grand Totals

Additionally, at the end of the video we also show how to add a Grand Total for each bar column.    Visit our Site: https://powerbi.tips/
